head.title: Brittany & Scott Wedding | Dana Marino Design
head.description: Clean and classic white and light blue wedding invitations for Brittany and Scott's romantic wedding in Bonita Springs, Florida at Hyatt Regency Coconut Point.

body.name: Brittany & Scott
body.description: Clean and classic white and light blue wedding invitations for Brittany and Scott's romantic wedding in Bonita Springs, Florida at Hyatt Regency Coconut Point. Day of stationery included ceremony programs, reception menus, and a seating chart sign with modern grey calligraphy and subtle blue watercolor swashes.

featureImage.alt: White and Light Blue Stacked Wedding Invitation with Belly Band
